Package databaseConnection

Class ShopDBConn

java.lang.Object
databaseConnection.SignupAndLoginExceptions
databaseConnection.DatabaseUpdate
databaseConnection.ShopDBConn
All Implemented Interfaces:
DBconnection
public class ShopDBConn extends DatabaseUpdate
This class provides methods for shop database operations such as activating accounts, logging in, changing passwords and names, lending and receiving cups, and querying cup holdings.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class databaseConnection.SignupAndLoginExceptions

    SignupAndLoginExceptions.AccountNotExistException, SignupAndLoginExceptions.IdAlreadyUsedException, SignupAndLoginExceptions.IdCantEmptyException, SignupAndLoginExceptions.InitialPasswordCantEmptyException, SignupAndLoginExceptions.NameCantEmptyException, SignupAndLoginExceptions.NotActivateException, SignupAndLoginExceptions.PasswordAlreadyUsedException, SignupAndLoginExceptions.PasswordCantEmptyException, SignupAndLoginExceptions.PasswordWrongException

  • Method Details

    • activateAccount

      public void activateAccount(String ID, String activatePassword, String newPassword) throws SQLException, SignupAndLoginExceptions.AccountNotExistException, SignupAndLoginExceptions.PasswordAlreadyUsedException, SignupAndLoginExceptions.PasswordWrongException, SignupAndLoginExceptions.IdCantEmptyException, SignupAndLoginExceptions.InitialPasswordCantEmptyException, SignupAndLoginExceptions.PasswordCantEmptyException
      Activates a shop account with the given ID and activation password, then sets a new password.
      Parameters:
      ID - the shop ID.
      activatePassword - the activation password.
      newPassword - the new password to set.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.
      SignupAndLoginExceptions.AccountNotExistException - if the account does not exist.
      SignupAndLoginExceptions.PasswordAlreadyUsedException - if the new password is already used.
      SignupAndLoginExceptions.PasswordWrongException - if the activation password is incorrect.
      SignupAndLoginExceptions.IdCantEmptyException - if the ID is empty.
      SignupAndLoginExceptions.InitialPasswordCantEmptyException - if the activation password is empty.
      SignupAndLoginExceptions.PasswordCantEmptyException - if the new password is empty.

    • login

      public void login(String ID, String password) throws SQLException, SignupAndLoginExceptions.PasswordWrongException, SignupAndLoginExceptions.NotActivateException, SignupAndLoginExceptions.AccountNotExistException, SignupAndLoginExceptions.IdCantEmptyException, SignupAndLoginExceptions.PasswordCantEmptyException
      Logs in a shop account with the given ID and password.
      Parameters:
      ID - the shop ID.
      password - the shop password.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.
      SignupAndLoginExceptions.PasswordWrongException - if the password is incorrect.
      SignupAndLoginExceptions.NotActivateException - if the account is not activated.
      SignupAndLoginExceptions.AccountNotExistException - if the account does not exist.
      SignupAndLoginExceptions.IdCantEmptyException - if the ID is empty.
      SignupAndLoginExceptions.PasswordCantEmptyException - if the password is empty.
